title: 106_hr4909
content: Makes the rate of dependency and indemnity compensation (DIC) for the surviving spouse of a veteran who was awarded the Purple Heart the same as the rate of compensation for service-connected disability or death that would be paid to a veteran if the veteran were not deceased . Makes annuities under the Survivor Benefit Plan 100 percent of the base amount. Repeals: (1) the requirement for annuity reduction at age 62. And (2) an alternative computation of such annuity for certain beneficiaries. Requires the recomputation of existing annuities due to amendments made by this Act.
